#################################
###### The Beijing Conference
#################################
event = {
        id = 600
        random = no
        country = SOV
		
		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
		
        name = "Socialist international conference"
        desc = "The old Comintern organization has not ceased to exist despite defeat in the WWII. After the reunion of the Soviet territories and the Commie victory in the CCW is time to convene a conference to renew the Comintern."
	
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 30
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
		
		decision = {			
			atwar = no 
			flag = CHC_won_civil_war
		}
	
		decision_trigger = {	
			atwar = no 
			flag = CHC_won_civil_war
		}
		
		#Just for AI ...
        trigger = {
			flag = CHC_won_civil_war
			#flag = CHI_won_civil_war ---> could be use in a future where we want made the chain also if Nationalist won CCW
			OR = {
				atwar = no
				war = { country = SOV  country = AXI }
			}			 
			event = 8014266 #Soviet Leadership - who is in charge
        }
 
        action = {
                name = "Invite only the Socialist countries"

				ai_chance = 55
                command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE }
				
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 7 }
				
                command = { type = money value = -500 }
                command = { type = belligerence value = 5 }
				
				command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
				
                command = { type = set_relation which = CHC value = 100 }                
				command = { trigger = { exists = U72 } type = set_relation which = U72 value = 50 } #Vietnam, if exist :D 
                command = { trigger = { exists = MON } type = set_relation which = MON value = 50 } #Mongolia, if exist :D 
                command = { trigger = { exists = SIK } type = set_relation which = SIK value = 50 } #Sinkiang, if exist :D                 			
				command = { trigger = { exists = PRK } type = set_relation which = PRK value = 50 } #North Korea, if exist :D
				command = { trigger = { exists = BUR alliance = { country = BUR country = SOV } } type = set_relation which = BUR value = 50 } #Burma, if exist :D
				
        }
		action = {
                name = "Invite all the Communist around the world"
				
				ai_chance = 40
                command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE }
				command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_WORLD } #For spread revolts all around the world!
				
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 8 }
				
                command = { type = money value = -1000 }
                command = { type = belligerence value = 5 }
				
				command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
				
                command = { type = set_relation which = CHC value = 100 }                
				command = { trigger = { exists = U72 } type = set_relation which = U72 value = 50 } #Vietnam, if exist :D 
                command = { trigger = { exists = MON } type = set_relation which = MON value = 50 } #Mongolia, if exist :D 
                command = { trigger = { exists = SIK } type = set_relation which = SIK value = 50 } #Sinkiang, if exist :D                 			
				command = { trigger = { exists = PRK } type = set_relation which = PRK value = 50 } #North Korea, if exist :D
				command = { trigger = { exists = BUR alliance = { country = BUR country = SOV } } type = set_relation which = BUR value = 50 } #Burma, if exist :D
        }
        action = {
                name = "No, deletes the conference we don't need it"
				
				ai_chance = 5
				
                command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -5 }
				command = { type = belligerence value = -10 }
				
                command = { type = set_relation which = CHC value = -100 }                
				command = { trigger = { exists = U72 } type = set_relation which = U72 value = -50 } #Vietnam, if exist :D 
                command = { trigger = { exists = MON } type = set_relation which = MON value = -50 } #Mongolia, if exist :D 
                command = { trigger = { exists = SIK } type = set_relation which = SIK value = -50 } #Sinkiang, if exist :D                 			
				command = { trigger = { exists = PRK } type = set_relation which = PRK value = -50 } #North Korea, if exist :D
				command = { trigger = { exists = BUR alliance = { country = BUR country = SOV } } type = set_relation which = BUR value = -50 } #Burma, if exist :D

        }

}

########################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### We received an invitation events
########################################
event = {
        id = 601
        random = no
        country = CHC
		
		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
		
        name = "Propose Communist China as host the Socialist international conference"
        desc = "Could be Beijng or Shangai or another chinese city"
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 3
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
        }
		
        action = {
                name = "Organize the conference"
				
				ai_chance = 90
				
				command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC }
				
                command = { type = money value = -500 }
				command = { type = dissent value = -5 }				
				command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 7 }
				command = { type = belligerence value = 3 }

				command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 }
        }
		
		action = {
				name = "No, we don't need it"

				ai_chance = 10
				
                command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
				
                command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = -100 }
                command = { type = set_relation which = MON value = -100 }
                command = { type = set_relation which = SIK value = -100 }
                command = { type = set_relation which = PRK value = -100 }
				command = { type = set_relation which = U72 value = -100 }
				command = { type = set_relation which = BUR value = -100 }
				
                command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = -10 }
											
				command = { type = end_access which = SOV } #if exist
				command = { type = end_non_aggression which = SOV where = CHC } #if exist
				command = { type = end_guarantee which = SOV where = CHC } #if exist
				
				command = { type = clrflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE }
        }

}

event = {
        id = 602
        random = no
        country = U72

		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"

        name = "We received an invitation"
        desc = "We received an invitation from Soviet Union for an international conference ... what will do ?"

		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 3
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
		
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
        }
  
        action = {
                name = "Let's go!"
				
				ai_chance = 90
				
				command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_U72 }
				
                command = { type = money value = -500 }
				command = { type = dissent value = -5 }				
				command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 7 }
				command = { type = belligerence value = 3 }

				command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 }
        }
		
		action = {
				name = "No,we've other priorities now"

				ai_chance = 10
				
                command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
				
                command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = -100 }
                command = { type = set_relation which = MON value = -100 }
                command = { type = set_relation which = SIK value = -100 }
                command = { type = set_relation which = PRK value = -100 }
				command = { type = set_relation which = CHC value = -100 }
				command = { type = set_relation which = BUR value = -100 }
				
                command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = -5 }
				
				command = { type = end_access which = SOV } #if exist
				command = { type = end_non_aggression which = SOV where = U72 } #if exist
				command = { type = end_guarantee which = SOV where = U72 } #if exist

}

event = {
        id = 603
        random = no
        country = MON

        name = "We have received an invitation"
        desc = "We have received an invitation from the Soviet Union for a conference in Beijing ... what will do ?"

        style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"

		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 3
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
		
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
        }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 90
                name = "Take the horses and ... let's go!"
				
				command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_MON }
                
                command = { type = money value = -500 }
				command = { type = dissent value = -5 }				
				command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 7 }
				command = { type = belligerence value = 3 }

				command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 }
        }
		
		action = {
				ai_chance = 10
                name = "No, we don't need it ... we are puppets !"
				ai_chance = 10
				
                command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
                command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = -5 }				
        }

}

                command = { type = set_relation which = SIK value = -100 }

event = {
        id = 605
        random = no
        country = SIB

        style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
		
        name = "We received an invitation"
        desc = "We received an invitation from the Soviet Union for a conference in Beijing ... what will do ?"

		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 3
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				alliance = { country = -1 country = SOV }
        }
		
        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "Ok"
				
				command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_SIB }
				
                command = { type = money value = -500 }
				command = { type = dissent value = -5 }				
				command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 7 }
				command = { type = belligerence value = 3 }

				command = { type = set_relation which = SOV value = 50 }
        }
		
}

#################################
###### The Conference
###### The Conference begins
#################################
event = {
        id = 607
        random = no
        country = SOV
		
        style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
		
        name = "The Socialist international Conference in China begins"
        desc = "All delegates are arrived, the Conference can officially begins"

        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
        }
		
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 20
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "Zdorov'ye tovarishchi!"
                command = { type = money value = -150 }
				command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
        }		
}

######################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Point One : Condamn the fascism
######################################
event = {
        id = 613
        random = no
        country = SOV
		
		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
				 
        name = "Day One : Condemns fascism in all its forms"
        desc = "Day One : Open the conference with a rude condamn of fascism in all its forms all around the world."
        
		date = { day = 10 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 7
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        trigger = {
			event = 607			
        }

        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "Condemns fascism"              
				command = { type = relation which = GER value = -20 }				
				command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -20 }								
				command = { type = relation which = AXI value = -20 }								
				command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -20 }
				#add other fascist countries ...
				
				command = { type = dissent value = -3 }		
				
        }	
        
}

###################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Point Two : Communism vision
###################################
event = {
        id = 614
        random = no
        country = SOV
		
		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
				 
        name = "Day Two : different point of view but one enemy"
        desc = "Day Two : We've different vision of the Communism doctrine but in this world we've one objective : spread socialism around the world and destroy fascisms wherever they are"
        
 
		date = { day = 10 month = february year = 1950 }
		offset = 7
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        trigger = {
			event = 613			
        }

        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "Unity under marx"    
				
                command = { type = relation which = MON value = 10 }
                command = { type = relation which = SIK value = 10 }
                command = { type = relation which = PRK value = 10 }
				command = { type = relation which = CHC value = 10 }
				command = { type = relation which = BUR value = 10 }
				command = { type = relation which = U72 value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = dissent value = -1 }					
        }	
        
}

###################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Point Three : Foreign Policy
###################################
event = {
        id = 615
        random = no
        country = SOV
		
		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"
				
        trigger = {
			flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
			event = 614			
        }
 
        name = "Day Three : Foreign Policy"
        desc = "Day Three : Foreign Policy. Now that we have a common vision, we need to decide where in the world spread our focus"
        
 
		date = { day = 10 month = february year = 1950 }
		offset = 7
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 85
                name = "Focus on Asia"
                command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_ASIA }
				
                command = { type = relation which = KOR value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = SIA value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = IND value = -50 }
				command = { type = relation which = PAK value = -50 }
				command = { type = relation which = AFG value = -50 }
				command = { type = relation which = PHI value = -50 }				
				command = { type = relation which = JAP value = -50 }								
				command = { type = relation which = CHI value = -50 }				
				
				command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
        }	
        
		action = {
				ai_chance = 10
                name = "Focus on Europe"
                command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_EUROPE }

				command = { type = relation which = GER value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -50 }
				command = { type = relation which = AXI value = -50 }	

				command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
        }
        
		action = {
				ai_chance = 5
                name = "Assume a defensive position"
                command = { type = setflag which = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_NOPE }

				command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -10 }

        }		
}

####################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Point Four : Economic Policy
####################################
event = {
        id = 616
        random = no
        country = SOV
      
 		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"

        name = "Day Four : Economic Policy"
        desc = "We must assume a new economic model that complements our national economies"

		date = { day = 15 month = february year = 1950 }
		offset = 7
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
		
		trigger = {
            flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
			event = 615
        }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "Integrate our economies"
                
				command = { type = money value = -500 }
				command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 3.0 }
				
        }		
		
}
########################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Point Five : Forge a new alliance
########################################
event = {
        id = 608
        random = no
        country = SOV

        style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"

        name = "Day Five : Forge a new alliance"
        desc = "We must forge a new Alliance exchanging knowledge and doctrine and training together our armies !"

		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 5
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

        trigger = {            
			event = 616
        }
		
        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "We must forge a new strong workers world alliance !"
				
				# Relations
				
                command = { type = belligerence value = 10 }
				
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = alliance which = CHC }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = relation which = CHC value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = access which = CHC }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = non_aggression which = CHC where = SOV }
				
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_U72} type = alliance which = U72 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_U72} type = relation which = U72 value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_U72} type = access which = U72 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_U72} type = non_aggression which = U72 where = SOV }

				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_SIK} type = alliance which = SIK }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_SIK} type = relation which = SIK value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_SIK} type = access which = SIK }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_SIK} type = non_aggression which = SIK where = SOV }
				
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_MON} type = alliance which = MON }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_MON} type = relation which = MON value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_MON} type = access which = MON }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_MON} type = non_aggression which = MON where = SOV }

				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = alliance which = BUR }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = relation which = BUR value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = access which = BUR }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = non_aggression which = BUR where = SOV }

				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = alliance which = PRK }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = relation which = PRK value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = access which = PRK }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = non_aggression which = PRK where = SOV }

				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = alliance which = SIK }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = relation which = SIK value = 200 }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = access which = SIK }
				command = { trigger = {flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC} type = non_aggression which = SIK where = SOV }
				
				# Armies
				
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 3 }
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 3 }
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 3 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = mechanized when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = mechanized when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = mechanized when = 2 }
								
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia I" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia II" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia III" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia IV" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia V" value = militia when = 7 }
				
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } # get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } # get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } # get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } # get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } # get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				
        }		
}
event = {
        id = 609
        random = no
        country = CHC
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_CHC
				event = 608
        }
 
        name = "Forge new alliance"
        desc = "We are in !"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 1
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action_a = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "We must forge a new strong workers world alliance !"
                
				command = { type = belligerence value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 200}
				command = { type = access which = SOV }
				command = { type = non_aggression which = SOV where = CHC }
				
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 3 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia I" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia II" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia III" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia IV" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia V" value = militia when = 7 }
								
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 } 
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }

				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched			
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched			
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched							
        }		
}
event = {
        id = 610
        random = no
        country = U72
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_VIE
				event = 608
        }
 
        name = "Forge new alliance"
        desc = "We are in !"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 1
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action_a = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "We must forge a new strong workers world alliance !"
                
				command = { type = belligerence value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 200}
				command = { type = access which = SOV }
				command = { type = non_aggression which = SOV where = U72 }
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 3 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = motorized when = 5 }
				
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia I" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia II" value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division which = "Lenin militia III" value = militia when = 7 }
								
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 13 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = armor when = 2 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				command = { type = add_division value = light_armor when = 2 }
				
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched	
				
        }

event = {
        id = 611
        random = no
        country = MON
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_MON
				event = 608
        }
 
        name = "Forge new alliance"
        desc = "We are in !"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 1
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action_a = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "We must forge a new strong workers world alliance !"
                
				command = { type = belligerence value = 10 }
				# command = { type = alliance which = SOV }
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 200}
				command = { type = access which = SOV }
				command = { type = non_aggression which = SOV where = MON }
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 2 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = militia when = 7 }
				command = { type = add_division value = militia when = 7 }
								
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 10 }
				
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched	

        }		
}
event = {
        id = 612
        random = no
        TAG = { SIK BUR PRK }
		all = yes
		
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				event = 608
				
				NOT = { 
					local_flag = ALLIANCE_IN
				}
        }
 
        name = "Forge new alliance"
        desc = "We are in !"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 1
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "We must forge a new strong workers world alliance !"
                
				command = { type = belligerence value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 200}
				command = { type = access which = SOV }
				#command = { type = alliance which = SOV }
				
				command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 10 }
				
				command = { type = add_division value = hq when = 3 }				
				command = { type = add_division value = infantry when = 10 }
				command = { type = add_division value = militia when = 8 }
				command = { type = add_division value = militia when = 8 }								

				
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				command = { type = gain_tech which = -2 } 		# get blueprints for a random tech currently being researched
				
				command = { type = local_setflag which = ALLIANCE_IN }	
				
        }		
}
##################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Conference Ended
##################################
event = {
        id = 617
        random = no
         country = SOV

 		style = 2
		picture = "spread_revolution"

        name = "End of Socialist international Conference"
        desc = "The conference is over and it was a success; it begins a new era for socialism in the world"
        
        trigger = {
            flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
			event = 608 
        }
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 5
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "A new era has begin"
				
                command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
        }		
}
##################################
###### The Beijing Conference
###### Axis and Allies reactions
#################################
event = {
        id = 618
        random = no
        country = GER
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				event = 617
        }
 
        name = "German reaction"
        desc = "The Beijing Conference is over, our spies have informed us that the socialist countries are revamping"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 1
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 90
                name = "Condamn the Conference"		
				
                command = { type = dissent value = 1 }	
				command = { type = belligerence value = 1 }
				
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -100 }
                command = { type = relation which = MON value = -100 }
                command = { type = relation which = SIK value = -100 }
                command = { type = relation which = PRK value = -100 }
				command = { type = relation which = CHC value = -100 }
				
        }	
        action = {
				ai_chance = 10
                name = "Launch Barbarossa 2"
				
				command = { type = end_non_aggression which = GER where = SOV }              
			    command = { trigger = { NOT = { exists = UTC } } type = trigger which = 900033 } #Barbarossa 2, solo se la Germania confine con l'Unione Sovietica
        }			
}
event = {
        id = 619
        random = no
        country = USA
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE
				event = 617
        }
 
        name = "American reaction"
        desc = "The Conference has ended"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
		offset = 1
		deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 95
                name = "Condamn the Conference"
				trigger = { flag= usa_cw_isolation }
				
                command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
				command = { type = belligerence value = 1 }
				
				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = MON value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = SIK value = -50 }
                command = { type = relation which = PRK value = -50 }
				command = { type = relation which = CHC value = -50 }
        }	
		
		action = {
				ai_chance = 95
                name = "Guaranteed the indipendence of our friends in Asia !"
				trigger = { flag= usa_cw_intervention }
			    command = { type = guarantee which = USA where = KOR }
				command = { type = guarantee which = USA where = JAP }
				command = { type = guarantee which = USA where = CHI }
				command = { type = guarantee which = USA where = PHI }

				command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -100 }
                command = { type = relation which = MON value = -100 }
                command = { type = relation which = SIK value = -100 }
                command = { type = relation which = PRK value = -100 }
				command = { type = relation which = CHC value = -100 }
				
        }	
		
        action = {
				ai_chance = 5
                name = "Crush Them before they become too strong !"
				
                command = { type = war which = SOV }
        }			
}

####################################
###### Spread the Revolutions - ASIA
####################################
event = {
        id = 620
        random = no
        country = SOV
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_ASIA
				event = 617
        }
 
        name = "Spread the Revolution in Asia"
        desc = "Our spies have done a great job, we are ready to launch a coordinated general uprising in asia!"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = september year = 1950 }
		offset = 180
		deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }
 
        action = {
				ai_chance = 30
                name = "Helps communist movements and coordinate a general uprising in Asia"
				
				command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
				command = { type = money value = -2000 }
				
				command = { type = trigger value = 621 }							
				
        }	
		
		action = {
				ai_chance = 65
                name = "We must free our neighbors from fascism directly !"

                command = { type = war which = SIA }												
				command = { trigger = { NOT = { puppet = { country = TIB country = CHC } } } type = war which = TIB }
				command = { type = war which = AFG }
				command = { type = war which = U03 }
				command = { type = war which = MAN }				
				command = { type = war which = UPE }								
				command = { trigger = { NOT = { alliance = { country = SOV country = BUR } } } type = war which = BUR }
				
				command = { type = sleepevent value = 621 }	
        }
		
		action = {
				ai_chance = 5
                name = "Attack in all directions and free the entire Asia continent !"
				
                command = { type = war which = KOR }
				command = { type = war which = U03 }
				command = { type = war which = JAP }
				command = { type = war which = BUR }
				command = { type = war which = TIB }
				command = { type = war which = CHI }
				command = { type = war which = PHI }
				command = { type = war which = AFG }
				command = { type = war which = SIA }
				command = { type = war which = MAN }
				command = { type = war which = UPE }				
				
				command = { type = sleepevent value = 621 }	
        }	
		
}

        id = 621

        country = U03

				event = 620

        style = 2

		offset = 180
		deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }

				ai_chance = 100
                name = "This means civil war !"
				
				command = { type = dissent value = 30 }

				event = 620
        }
 
        name = "Communist revolts !"
        desc = "The Communist spies have done a great job, they are ready to launch a coordinated general uprising in the Republique !"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = july year = 1950 }
		offset = 360
		deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }
 
		action = {
				ai_chance = 100
                name = "Damn !"

event = {
        id = 630
        random = no
        country = SOV
        trigger = {
                flag = COMINTERN_CONFERENCE_EUROPE
								event = 620
        }
 
        name = "We must destroy the Nazi"
        desc = "The defeat in the last war should finally be our revenge ... let's go to Berlin!"
        style = 2
 
		date = { day = 1 month = september year = 1950 }
		offset = 360
		deathdate = { day = 1 month = december year = 1960 }
 
		action = {
				ai_chance = 20
                name = "Attack the Reich ! Spread the WW3 !"
                command = { type = end_non_aggression which = SOV where = GER }
				command = { type = war which = GER }				
        }	
		action = {
				ai_chance = 80
                name = "No, the time is not now !"
                command = { type = dissent value = 20 }
        }			
}


####################################
###### FAte of Afghanistan
####################################
event = { 

	id = 650 
	random = no
	country = SOV
    save_date = yes

	name = "Fate of Afghanistan"
	desc = "TODO" 
	
	style = 2
	picture = "east_turkestan"
	
    trigger = {		
		control = { province = 2171 data = SOV } # Kabul
		NOT = { exists = AFG }         
	}
	
    date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }
	
action = { 
	name = "Integrate as Afghan SSR" 
	ai_chance = 50
	command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	command = { type = manpowerpool value = -20 }
	
	command = { type = addclaim which = 2172 }
	command = { type = addclaim which = 2169 }
	command = { type = addclaim which = 2171 }
	command = { type = addclaim which = 2168 }
	command = { type = addclaim which = 2170 }
	command = { type = addclaim which = 2173 }
}
action = { 
	name = "Liberate as Democratic Republic of Afghanistan" 
	ai_chance = 50
	command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
	command = { type = independence which = AFG value = 1 } 
	command = { type = make_puppet which = AFG }
	#command = { type = event which = 651 where = AFG when = 1 }
	command = { type = trigger which = 651 }
}	

}

event = { 

	id = 651
	random = no
	country = AFG
    save_date = yes

	name = "Democratic Republic of Afghanistan"
	desc = "TODO" 
	
	style = 2
	picture = "east_turkestan"
	
	trigger = {
		#event = { id = 650 days = 180 } 
        exists = AFG 
	}

	
    date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1952 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
	
action = { 
	name = "We are free now" 
	ai_chance = 100
	command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	command = { type = name where = AFG which = "Democratic Republic of Afghanistan" }		
	command = { type = flag_ext where = AFG which = _commie }	
	
}

}

################" Integration of Afghan SSR
event = { 
	id = 652 
	random = no
	country = SOV

	name = "Integration of Afghan SSR"
	desc = "TODO" 
	style = 2
	picture = "sinkiang"
	
    trigger = {
		event = { id = 650 days = 180 } 
        NOT = { exists = AFG }
	}
	
        date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1951 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }
	
action = { 
				name = "Okay!" 
                command = { type = research_mod value = 5 }
                command = { type = tc_mod value = 10 }
                command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
                command = { type = manpowerpool value = 50 } 
				command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 2 }
				command = { type = addcore which = 2172 }
				command = { type = addcore which = 2169 }
				command = { type = addcore which = 2171 }
				command = { type = addcore which = 2168 }
				command = { type = addcore which = 2170 }
				command = { type = addcore which = 2173 }
                command = { type = event which = 8014312 where = SOV when = 1}
        }
}

###############################The fate of Afghan's military
event = { 
         id = 653
         random = no
         country = SOV
         
		 name = "The fate of Afghan's military"
         desc = "TODO"
         
		 style = 2
         picture = "spread_revolution"

         trigger = {
                  event = 652
         }

       date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
       offset = 1
       deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1965 }

action = {
		name = "Recall only the professionnal part"
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 35 }
		command = { type = add_division which = infantry when = 7 }
		command = { type = add_division which = infantry when = 7 }
		command = { type = add_division which = cavalry when = 7 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		ai_chance = 55
         }

action = {
name = "recall everyone"
command = { type = add_division which = infantry when = 7 }
command = { type = add_division which = infantry when = 7 }
command = { type = add_division which = cavalry when = 7 }
command = { type = add_division which = militia when = 4 }
command = { type = add_division which = militia when = 4 }
command = { type = add_division which = militia when = 4 }
command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
ai_chance = 25
         }

action = { 
name = "we do not need these men"
command = { type = manpowerpool value = 75 }
command = { type = dissent value = -5 }
ai_chance = 10
         }

action = {
name = "they helped the traitors, to the goulags!!"
command = { type = dissent value = 7 }
command = { type = tc_mod value = 2 }
command = { type = peacetime_ic_mod value = 2 }
command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 2172 value = 20 }
command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 2169 value = 20 }
command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 2171 value = 20 }
command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 2168 value = 20 }
command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 2170 value = 20 }
command = { type = province_revoltrisk which = 2173 value = 20 }
}

}

####################################
###### FAte of India
####################################
event = { 

	id = 654
	random = no
	country = CHC
	
	name = "Fate of India"
	desc = "TODO" 
	
	style = 2
	picture = "east_turkestan"
	
    trigger = {		
		OR = {
			control = { province = 1458 data = CHC } # Dehli
		}
		NOT = { exists = IND }    
	}
	
    date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }
	
action = { 
	name = "Dehli meeting" 
	ai_chance = 100
	command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	command = { type = secederegion which = SOV value = "India" }
	command = { type = secederegion which = SOV value = "Afghanistan" }
	command = { type = trigger which = 655 }
}	
	
}

event = { 

	id = 655
	random = no
	country = SOV
	
	name = "Fate of India"
	desc = "TODO" 
	
	style = 2
	picture = "east_turkestan"
	
    trigger = {		
		control = { province = 1459 data = SOV } # Dehli
		NOT = { exists = IND }    
	}
	
    date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1950 }
	offset = 5
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1999 }
	
action = { 
	name = "Liberate as Socialist Union of India" 
	ai_chance = 90
	command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	command = { type = independence which = IND value = 1 } 
	command = { type = make_puppet which = IND }
	command = { type =	secedeprovince which = IND value = 1456 } #Nepal
	command = { type =	secedeprovince which = IND value = 1457 } #Bhutan
	command = { type = trigger which = 656 }
	
}	

action = { 
	name = "Create SEAU" 
	ai_chance = 10
	command = { type = dissent value = 30 }
	command = { type = trigger which = 888888 }
}	


}

event = { 

	id = 656
	random = no
	country = IND
    save_date = yes

	name = "Socialist Union of India"
	desc = "TODO" 
	
	style = 2
	picture = "east_turkestan"

action = { 
	name = "We are free now" 
	ai_chance = 100
	command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	command = { type = name where = IND which = "Socialist Union of India" }		
	#command = { type = flag_ext where = AFG which = _commie }	
	
}

}
